name: Sudoku Legend - Free Sudoku Puzzles
description:
Sudoku puzzles are the best game to relax your mind. You can play them for ultimate fun and train your brain to think logically. This 1 to 9 numbers puzzle is for people of all ages. It offers unlimited entertainment with 4 different modes - easy, medium, hard and expert. Try this classic Sudoku free puzzles game on your mobile and intrigue your mind with awesome quests.

This Classic Sudoku solver is for amateur and experienced players. You will need to fill 9 grids with numbers from 1 to 9 without repeating a single number. When you start playing, you will need the help of hints. As you progress through, you will get to know everything about the game and can solve the Sudoku free puzzles without much trouble.

This Sudoku Classic game highlights the duplicate entries. If you make 3 errors in a row, you will have to start from the beginning or use coins to continue. To avoid this, click on the ‘Notes’ options and play. This way, you can avoid wrong entries.

Fill the grid/row/column without any repetitions and your free Sudoku classic puzzle is solved! The game is expected to help you de-stress yourself and is a better version when compared to using the pen and paper. The latter is messy as you will need to rub off the incorrect letters. In our mobile game, you can use notes and find the solutions in a clear method. There are many players who believe Sodoku helps them with their reasoning. Do you wish to sedoku master the game and challenge your friends with high scores?

👉 Here are a few tips that will help you master it.

👉 Sudoku Tips and tricks to help you!

✔ Start with a single nonet (a grid/column/row of 9).
✔ Use the notes option before entering a number to avoid any mistakes.
✔ Crosshatching the rows and columns will prevent you from using the same number twice.
✔ Start with a nonet that is filled with the maximum numbers.
✔ Use hints to help you in the initial stages.


★ Game Features ★

★ Free to play on mobile phones and tablets.
★ Most popular free sudoku puzzle games for kids and adults.
★ Multiple game modes to make it interesting.
★ The best daily Sudoku games for kids.
★ Engage your mind with interesting soduko challenges.
★ Use hints when faced with challenging mode.
★ Play with friends and family and compete for high scores.
★ You can enjoy Sudoku challenging games offline also.

👉 No Wifi or data? Even without the internet, you can play Sudoku game and get entertained daily. Have you started the fun?
